text: È wuzeɠeʋɛ geeɠɔlɔgi Maliɠii GALA daalɔɠɔma, è ʋaaʋɛ ga sei ʋɛlɛi wu aniɲaka ɲadegaiti è ʋɔ bɛ, wo ti zeɠeʋɛ, wo dɔɔi ɓɔle ti zu, ɗa-o, ɗa-wotiɠɛ nu wolaiti-yo, è-anzaiti-yo, ta è-anzaiti ti la vuluni ga zɔiti kɛʋele. É ɓudɛ naa maazu, è guyei looʋɛ, è ɗa kɔɔɠɔ ganigiti maamusɛ niiti ti ɓɛtɛai ga walii ta zanugi, ta kɔlu ɓɔigi, ta kɔlui, ta gului, ta kɔtui, kɔɔɠɔ ganigiti è ti ɠaazu ga galagiti, kɛlɛ ti la wozaɠaazu, ti la faa mɛnisu, ta ti la faa nɔpɛ kwɛɛ. Kɛlɛ è ɠɛlɛʋɛ ga è mina lɛbiyai ve GALA bɛ nii è-yɛnvui zea niizu, ta è yeeluɠɔ ʋele vaiti pɛ.
